## Ignore Visual Studio temporary files, build results, and user-generated files
 
# Build results
[Bb]in/
[Oo]bj/
[Ll]og/
 
# User-specific files
*.user
*.suo
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates
 
# Mono Auto Generated Files
mono_crash.*
 
# VS Code settings folder
.vscode/
 
# Windows image file caches
Thumbs.db
ehthumbs.db
 
# ASP.NET Scaffolding
ScaffoldingReadMe.txt
 
# Environment variable files
.env
 
# NuGet packages
*.nupkg
*.snupkg
packages/
.nuget/
 
# DotCover
.idea/
*.dotCover
 
# JetBrains Rider
.idea/
*.sln.iml
 
# Rider plugin
.idea/
 
# Temporary files
*.tmp
*.bak
*.swp
*.log
 
# Others
_ReSharper*/
*.resharper
*.cache
*.dbmdl
*.dbproj.schemaview
*.vs/
